name: teampass
description: Installs/Configures teampass a collaborative password management site http://www.teampass.net/

recipes.teampass::corefiles: Installs core teampass files and dependancies
recipes.teampass::database-mysql: Installs mysql and sets up database schema and user grants
recipes.teampass::webserver-apache2: Installs Apache2 and creates a virtual host for teampass
